ProductInfo.Features:
Simultaneously record and monitor 4 cameras. Real time remote surveillance by PC Monitor
Record mode 24 hour motion detection recording (all cameras), Pre-alarm recording, Alarm input recording
30 fps display and 30 fps recording. MPEG4 Record Resolutions up to 640 x 480 NTSC, 768 x 576 PAL
Remote control: pan/tilt, zoom, control and various electronic machinery and tools
Package Includes: 1 of 4 channel PCI DVR card, 4 x CCD infrared security cameras, 4 x 12V DC power supplies, 4 x video power cables and free warning stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Channel Home CCTV Security Surveillance System Digital Video PCI DVR Card with 4 x CCD Night Vision IR Security Cameras and Power Supplies, Extension Cables CEH
